sections.purpose: To monitor temperature of ovens, drying chambers, stability cabinets, and extraction baths.
sections.scope: Applicable to routine temperature checks in Pharmacognosy laboratory operations.
procedure: Switch ON the thermometer and check the display for proper function.
Select appropriate probe and measurement range.
Place or immerse the probe in the area or medium to be measured, ensuring good contact.
Wait for the reading to stabilize and record the temperature.
Remove the probe and clean/dry it if necessary before storage.
precautions: Do not expose the probe beyond its specified temperature limits.
Avoid kinking or sharply bending the probe cable.
Disinfect probes used in biological materials.
Calibrate regularly against a reference thermometer.
Store the instrument in a dry place when not in use.
